question: I'd like an asexual main character for season 5. What bothers me, well bother is too strong of a word really, is how the characters are so preoccupied with love, dating and relationships. When I was in highschool, I wasn't interested in those things at all. I was also oblivious it was so important to others. I'm sure I wasn't the only one with this experience. Arthur might be a good candidate, don't know why. Him kissing Alexia and the woman with kids don't have to mean anything.

summary: if you can root for isak and even after even dumped him to go back to his girlfriend then you can root for imane and sofiane
question: if you can root for isak and even after even dumped him to go back to his girlfriend then you can root for imane and sofiane
answer:
I watched the og in real time back then and I was mad at Even.  I had NO idea what went on with him and why he was doing this.  It may seem weird now but a lot of us, back in episode five of Isak’s season, had absolutely no idea that Even had a mental illness and that going back to his girlfriend of four years might have been like a safety blanket for him after hearing his not-yet-boyfriend’s thoughts on mentally ill people.  I understood later.  I changed my mind.  

So yeah, I can be mad at Sofiane now.  Maybe he will get to tell his reasons too for dating Imane’s best friend immediately after being friendzoned.  I can change my mind then, you know?  Me being annoyed at his actions now doesnt mean that I hate him or that I will always think that he’s a terrible person.  That’s the beauty of Skam and its real time format, you know?  We may not know everything at the moment because we’re only in the main character’s heart and mind, but our knowledge may change and with that our opinion.  

I adored Sofiane in the first few episodes because from Imane’s view he WAS perfect.  We saw him through her eyes.  And now she is angry at him and I get her.  I can emphasize with her.  And I can guarantee her opinion will change again too.  So…..it’s all good.

blog.description: little blog for these two french boys in love

title: What They Don’t Know
body:
The girls are just trying to set Manon up with the cute barista behind the counter, but Lucas isn’t having any of it.

“Manon he’s definitely staring at you.” The girls and Lucas had decided to get something to eat on a sunny Saturday at a local cafe. From the moment they walked in Alexia and Daphné had been gawking at and giggling about the person behind the register. He was tall and slim with wild hair and stormy blue eyes, when they had ordered he flashed them a bright smile and you could hear the swooning sighs they had let out. Lucas was the last to order and he gave the barista a smile before heading off to the table the girls were at.

“Girl, you have to get his number. Do you see him? If not, I’m going in.” Alexia reached over the table to lightly slap the other girl on the arm. Manon bat her hand away with a light flush on her cheeks.

“Really? I mean he’s cute, but should I really do it?” She glanced over at the worker and snapped her eyes away when she caught his eyes. She placed her hand on Lucas beside her and squeezed.

“Maybe you shouldn’t, you just had a bad date last week.” Lucas shrugged and glanced at all the girls who had a confused look on their faces.

“But that means that now she can get over that. Come on Lucas he’s gorgeous, this is what Manon needs.” Emma squinted as the boy huffed. 

“I’m just saying, maybe she doesn’t want a date.”

“Are you kidding me Lucas? She’s been whining about getting a boyfriend for a month now.”

“Just… not him, okay?”

“Why not, he’s perfect for her!”

 “He is, Lucas. And we needa get this girl a man!” Someone beside their table cleared their throat and everyone whipped their head up to see the gorgeous boy standing there with food.

“Hi, here’s everything for you guys!” The worker began setting the stuff on the table when Daphné spoke up. “We come here all the time, but I don’t think we’ve ever seen you? What’s your name?”

The boy tucked the tray under his arm as he finished setting everything down. “Oh, I usually work nights before closing and early mornings. I’m Eliott.” He flashed his smile and glanced at Manon’s side of the table, his smile growing impossibly wider. Emma, Daphné, and Alexia practically had hearts in their eyes, Imane raised her eyebrows and chuckled at how ridiculous the girls were being, and Lucas was just quietly scowling at all of them, keeping his eyes away from Eliott.

“Nice to meet you Eliott, say, our girl Manon over here has just been discussing about how no one seems to want to date her, can you tell her how utter bullshit that is? I mean, look at her, who wouldn’t wanna kiss this beautiful face?” Emma reached out to squish Manon’s cheeks but was quickly slapped away by her blushing friend, mumbling, Jesus, don’t make me sound so desperate. All the girls looked to Eliott for his answer while Lucas sat there and burned holes into the boy’s head with his glare.

Eliott glanced at Lucas and something flashed in his eyes before turning to Manon with a crinkly-eyed smile. “Yeah. Really beautiful. Don’t know how you don’t have a boyfriend yet.” Everyone heard Lucas scoff but chose to ignore it in favor of watching Manon and Eliott. The girl quickly looked down at her lap and started fidgeting with her napkin before looking back at Eliott with a smile.

“She really is, how about going on a date with her?”

“Daphné!” Manon practically shrieked at the blonde’s blunt question. Imane and Emma started laughing at the look on Eliott’s face while Lucas gave a surprised squeak with his mouth agape.

Eliott stood there shocked for a second before chuckling and gazing at Manon. “I’m really flattered, truly. You seem great, but I’m in a relationship at the moment.” He gave an apologetic smile as his eyes flitted past the girl for second before looking back to her. “I should really get back to work, it was nice meeting all of you, thank you for the entertainment.” He gave a parting wave and spun on his heel, going back to behind the counter and beginning to clean some utensils.

Imane sighed and began to eat. “Daph that was way too forward, you scared him.” The blonde blushed, picking up her fork and moving her food around the plate. “Sorry Manon, I really thought this would work out.”

Manon gave Daphné a pat on the arm, “It’s fine babe, I’ll find a good one soon.” As she said this she turned to Lucas and gave him a smirk. “Speaking of, our little boy here has someone but refuses to tell anyone about it.” Manon pushed her bottom lip out in a pout.

Emma clutched at her heart and gasped “Lucas! You’re getting some dick and haven’t told us? The audacity.”

Lucas turned bright red and shushed her “Shut the fuck up, you’re so loud.” He glanced at the register for a quick second before rubbing a hand over his face. “It’s new, we only became ‘official’ two weeks ago.”

Daphné squealed and started bouncing in her seat, “Oh my GOD! What’s his name? What does he do? How old is he? How tall is he? Is he pretty?”

Lucas grimaced and shook his head, “You’ll find out soon I promise.” He picked up his sandwich and began to eat while the girls kept pestering him with questions.

“Do you really wanna meet him that bad?”

“Yes!” All the girls shrieked and Lucas rolled his eyes at them.

“Fine, okay you can meet him. Today.”

“Oh my god, when?” Lucas glanced past Manon, a bright smile taking over his features.

“In a bit.” Lucas said as he continued eating. The girls shrugged and slipped into silence as they all picked up their food.

After a little while everyone was done eating and they just sat there talking. “You got an ETA on lover boy Lucas?”

Lucas lifted his head and looked towards the front of the cafe before nodding, “Yeah, right now.”

“Long time no see.” A voice behind Manon spoke up and heads whipped to see Eliott standing in casual clothes instead of his apron. All the girls sat there confused until realization slowly hit them.

Lucas stood up and walked over to the taller boy, smiling up at him. Eliott placed his hands on both of Lucas’ cheeks, giving him a gentle kiss. “Hi baby, how was your day?”

Lucas hummed and shrugged his shoulders “It was good, spent it with the girls. Didn’t do much else.”

“So you led them to my cafe just so you can see me? Babe, you’re so cute!” Lucas scowl and pulled away from Eliott’s embrace.

“That’s it, I’m breaking up with you.”

“Baby, nooooooo.” Elliot made grabby hands for his boyfriend but they were dodged.

The girls just started at them with wide eyes because what the fuck. This was the guy they were just trying to set up with Manon, who was practically Lucas’ sister.

Imane cleared her throat for attention, raising her eyebrows when Lucas gave her a sheepish look. “So, uh. This is my boyfriend, Eliott. Thank you so very much for trying to pawn him off on Manon, much appreciated.”

Daphné at least had the decency to look embarrassed, Alexia licked her lips and smirked. “Well that’s a threesome I wouldn’t mind being in.”

“Oh my fucking god, you’re a fucking heathen. We’re leaving.” Lucas started tugging at Eliott’s hand while the boy waved. laughing out a nice to meet you over his shoulder before his boyfriend ripped the door open and sprinted outside.

The girls all looked at each other and doubled over in laughter. “Well, at least he’ll be less grumpy now that he’s getting dick.”

“Emma!”
body_abstract: The girls are just trying to set Manon up with the cute barista behind the counter, but Lucas isn’t having any of it.

You seem great, but I’m in a relationship at the moment.” He gave an apologetic smile as his eyes flitted past the girl for second before looking back to her. “I should really get back to work, it was nice meeting all of you, thank you for the entertainment.” He gave a parting wave and spun on his heel, going back to behind the counter and beginning to clean some utensils.

Imane sighed and began to eat. “Daph that was way too forward, you scared him.” The blonde blushed, picking up her fork and moving her food around the plate. “Sorry Manon, I really thought this would work out.”

Manon gave Daphné a pat on the arm, “It’s fine babe, I’ll find a good one soon.” As she said this she turned to Lucas and gave him a smirk. “Speaking of, our little boy here has someone but refuses to tell anyone about it.” Manon pushed her bottom lip out in a pout.

Emma clutched at her heart and gasped “Lucas! You’re getting some dick and haven’t told us? The audacity.”

Lucas turned bright red and shushed her “Shut the fuck up, you’re so loud.” He glanced at the register for a quick second before rubbing a hand over his face. “It’s new, we only became ‘official’ two weeks ago.”

Daphné squealed and started bouncing in her seat, “Oh my GOD! What’s his name? What does he do? How old is he? How tall is he? Is he pretty?”

Lucas grimaced and shook his head, “You’ll find out soon I promise.” He picked up his sandwich and began to eat while the girls kept pestering him with questions.

“Do you really wanna meet him that bad?”

“Yes!” All the girls shrieked and Lucas rolled his eyes at them.

“Fine, okay you can meet him. Today.”

“Oh my god, when?” Lucas glanced past Manon, a bright smile taking over his features.

“In a bit.” Lucas said as he continued eating. The girls shrugged and slipped into silence as they all picked up their food.

After a little while everyone was done eating and they just sat there talking. “You got an ETA on lover boy Lucas?”

Lucas lifted his head and looked towards the front of the cafe before nodding, “Yeah, right now.”

“Long time no see.” A voice behind Manon spoke up and heads whipped to see Eliott standing in casual clothes instead of his apron. All the girls sat there confused until realization slowly hit them.

Lucas stood up and walked over to the taller boy, smiling up at him. Eliott placed his hands on both of Lucas’ cheeks, giving him a gentle kiss. “Hi baby, how was your day?”

Lucas hummed and shrugged his shoulders “It was good, spent it with the girls. Didn’t do much else.”

“So you led them to my cafe just so you can see me? Babe, you’re so cute!” Lucas scowl and pulled away from Eliott’s embrace.

“That’s it, I’m breaking up with you.”

“Baby, nooooooo.” Elliot made grabby hands for his boyfriend but they were dodged.

The girls just started at them with wide eyes because what the fuck. This was the guy they were just trying to set up with Manon, who was practically Lucas’ sister.

Imane cleared her throat for attention, raising her eyebrows when Lucas gave her a sheepish look. “So, uh. This is my boyfriend, Eliott. Thank you so very much for trying to pawn him off on Manon, much appreciated.”

Daphné at least had the decency to look embarrassed, Alexia licked her lips and smirked. “Well that’s a threesome I wouldn’t mind being in.”

“Oh my fucking god, you’re a fucking heathen. We’re leaving.” Lucas started tugging at Eliott’s hand while the boy waved. laughing out a nice to meet you over his shoulder before his boyfriend ripped the door open and sprinted outside.

The girls all looked at each other and doubled over in laughter. “Well, at least he’ll be less grumpy now that he’s getting dick.”

“Emma!”

blog.title: parfois il faut choisir
blog.description: ❤️ kate // eliott demaury AND maxence danet fauvel must be protected at all costs // sideblog for all things SKAM and my other OTPs // follows/likes/replies come from @itsthelastquestion // gif/fic requests open :)

tags: that was a really good clip imo
summary: well that clip was a rollercoaster huh. first we see alexia dancing and imane looking on proudly. i said it in my previous post...
body:
well that clip was a rollercoaster huh.

first we see alexia dancing and imane looking on proudly. i said it in my previous post that alexia’s demeanor is different when it’s just the two of them compared when they’re with the whole crew and i like that. i love their friendship - alexia reaching out to imane to come with her to the audition, needing her support to go through it. and imane, putting aside her misgivings at being at the MJC so she can be there for alexia. (also, can i just say how graceful coline is? <3)

then imane got called to audition too. oooooh, we all know who put her name down (my thoughts on that later). seeing imane dancing her heart out made me tear up. to finally see her smiling again, doing what she loved, just being herself… OH MY HEART <3 and when alexia hugged her afterwards, so proud of her friend? i felt that.

now onto sofiane. you can see that he still has feelings for imane. his smile as he was watching her dance was a mixture of pride and wistfulness.

the thing is, i can see both sides. sofiane, signed her up without her knowledge, knowing full well that she wouldn’t have done it herself. it’s not his place to do that (at all!) but his intention was good, i think. he knew dancing makes imane happy and he wanted to see her happy. the timing and the situation just wasn’t right bro. imane, after the high of dancing on stage, came crashing back to her reality upon seeing sofiane. she confronted him and finally let out some steam that had been building up inside her these past few weeks. was she harsh? yes. can you blame her? not really. yes, she’s the one who cut off their relationship however, she did offer him friendship and he accepted it. but then going out with one of imane’s closest friends? not it, bro. if he did go out with anyone else other than manon, imane would still be jealous but she wouldn’t be as hurt as she is right now.

lemme also insert on here that alexia asking if she’s okay before she left them was nice. she probably noticed something was off with imane and while she didn’t pry and didn’t outwardly give any indication, this was at least a step in the right direction. when imane finally breaks down from all the pressure, i do believe it’s gonna be alexia who will help her pick up the pieces.

i can’t wait to see where this goes. we’re finally getting some movement yaaasss.. hopefully, this week’s episode ends on a high note for imane and for us lol. but then again, it could also end up being explosive af. better prepare the alcohol, then.

body:
what if Eliott just got Snapchat and Lucas is in the common room with either boy or girls squat (or both) when Eliott starts sending him hot pictures, making Lucas super horny. When the other realize what is happening they just find it hilarious while Lucas is very embarrassed and decides to skip the next classes to “lecture” his naughty boyfriend

imagine Lucas works out and he talks Eliott into coming with him. Lucas can be a really strict trainer, until Eliott starts teasing him in a sexual manner. Obviously the training ends up in them making out.

Can you write one were Lucas, Yann, Basile and Arthur have PE and Lucas has a lot of bruises and hickeys from the rough sex with Eliott the night before, which they see when they’re in the locker room changing, that they tease him for the rest of the day

——————————————-



It was a long PE class. Lucas is exhausted, sitting on the bench of the locker room while checking his phone. Yann and the boys keep looking at him, smiling. 

They saw a few hickeys on his neck and collarbone when Lucas decided to take his hoodie off while they were running. It almost caused a big accident between them. Arthur stumbled on Lucas’ feet and both of them almost fell on their faces. Just because Arthur saw a few red marks on his skin.

They walked to the locker room while Yann discussed with the other two how old the hickeys were. Yann said they were from the night before (he’s right), saying that they don’t look too dark yet. Basile starts explaining how Yann is right and when he starts talking about Daphné Lucas screams at them, begging them to forget about it. 

Now Lucas is too tired to care or to get up, taking his shirt off while he tries to force himself to get up and take a shower so he can go home, letting the boys fully analyze his top half.

While he was in class, Eliott sent him a few messages. Lucas opens one of them thinking that he’s just being cute and silly, telling Lucas how much he misses him, how good he looked wearing his gym clothes but no. 

Lucas closes the picture as soon as he opens it. He tries to quietly look around. Arthur, Basile, and Yann are sitting in front of him, also on their phones, whispering between them, probably still making fun of Lucas now that they can see his whole torso. Lucas just rolls his eyes, giving them one last look and so he looks back at his phone, opening the picture. 

The grey t-shirt his boyfriend was using earlier didn’t make Eliott any justice. He looks like perfection, with his shorts way too low, almost showing too much, no shirt on, showing his perfect abs, his freckles. Why is he wearing his gym shorts? He should have worn one that was longer so Lucas wouldn’t be able to see his thighs. 

Everything, every muscle on Eliott’s body is perfect. He’s definitely Lucas’ type. Not too big, not too muscular. He’s long, just the right amount of lean, looking like a Greek god if you ask Lucas. 

He doesn’t even work out, he doesn’t need to and Lucas works his ass off at the gym. Or he used to before they started dating. 

He only has time to close the photo before Yann snatches the phone from his hands. 

“Yann! Putain, give it back!”

“You’re sexting, Lulu!” Arthur looks at him, his mouth making a big O.

“No, I’m not! Yann!” His best friend finally gives the phone back and Lucas takes it instantly, putting it inside his bag. 

“I cannot believe it. You’re such a grown man now. you were a baby just weeks ago and-”

Lucas rolls his eyes to Yann, everyone is laughing at his face. 

“I thought you had lives to live, girls to make out with, but no, you’ll never get over the fact that I got the hottest guy in town.”

“Well, I have to agree with you after these pictures.” Lucas knows they wouldn’t open the pictures without permission, but he’s sure they saw at least the previews. 

“Yeah, he’s taken. And I’m his first pick as well, so, too bad for you guys.”

His friends frown, exchanging a look.

“What? Who is in second place?“ 

“I don’t care, but I’m sure it’s none of you assholes.” He answers as he picks his phone back. 

to Eliott: You’re so mean! 

He keeps looking at his phone, ignoring his friends completely. Eliott is already answering. 

to Lucas: I love you

to Eliott: Are you home?

to Lucas: On my way, where are you?

to Eliott: I’ll be home soon. And I need to see you there. 

to Lucas: I’ll be anxiously waiting for you <3
